name: RefreshDashboardSharing
description:
Refresh a dashboard's sharing link in Datadog environments.

Use this tool to refresh the sharing link for a specific dashboard within a Datadog environment. This is useful for updating the link to maintain access or to apply new sharing settings.

parameters.name: dashboard_id
parameters.description: The unique integer ID of the Datadog dashboard to refresh the sharing link for.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Specify the Project ID for accessing the desired project in Datadog. Retrieve it via a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dashboard_sharing_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the sharing details, such as whether sharing is enabled, access token, creation date, settings, password requirement, and share passwords.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
